thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com | 2 de 20
thread.title: Paloma Calvo

author: Paloma Calvo
title: Paloma Calvo
text:
I totally recommend this site. I was really nervous about finding a place in Milan, since I had been searching by myself for a week and I found nothing that could suit me. Then I remembered that a friend once told me about this site and I tried. Anna De Leo was my agent and she was great, she took care of it, and in less than a day I had a place to stay, it couldn't be easier! The best thing about this site is that they have all the information about each one of the properties which saves you so much time...
Paloma.
